snippet: Stan Wawrinka won his fourth title at the Chennai Open on Sunday with a 6-3, 7-5 win over promising teenager Borna Coric of Croatia....
lead_paragraph: Stan Wawrinka won his fourth title at the Chennai Open on Sunday with a 6-3, 7-5 win over promising teenager Borna Coric of Croatia.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka Beats Coric for 4th Chennai Open Title
headline.main: Wawrinka Beats Coric for 4th Chennai Open Title
